amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate in support of full funding and availability of the Crime Victims Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 203 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 203 proposed by Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S2937-2938; text: CR S2937-2938) To express the sense of the Senate in support of full funding and availability of the Crime Victims Fund.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 203 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 203 proposed by Senator Leahy.
